abstract: Notre Dame loses running back Tarean Folston with season-ending knee injury; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tarean Folston is out for the season after tearing a ligament in his right knee in No. 11 Notre Dame’s 38-3 victory over Texas.
snippet: Tarean Folston is out for the season after tearing a ligament in his right knee in No. 11 Notre Dame’s 38-3 victory over Texas.
